title: Angry Rebekah Vardy warns Coleen Rooney 'prepare for court unless you believe me'
text:

The Wags war that rumbles on between Rebekah Vardy and Coleen Rooney 'could be heading for court' unless claims are withdrawn.

It has been reported that 37-year-old Rebekah, 37, has warned Coleen,33, to "believe me or I'll see you in court."

In a sensational reveal on Wednesday, Coleen had announced to the world via her social media that Rebekah was the source of a number of leaks from her private Instagram .

The fallout since then has been bitter and a source has told The Sun that Rebekah "is prepared to see Coleen in court if necessary," as she looks to clear her name.

Coleen has insisted that she will now only communicate with Rebekah via their legal teams, as the saga is set to turn even nastier as the pair look to prove they are the innocent parties.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: GC Images)

Friends of Coleen have insisted that she would not hand over evidence of the alleged leaks as she's "had enough of Rebekah's outbursts."

It has been reported that Coleen is "comfortable about the evidence that she has and doesn’t want a big legal fight.”

Rebekah on the other hand is fully prepared to go to court to prove that she "hasn’t done anything wrong."

(Image: Getty Images)

The wife of Leicester City and England striker, Jamie Vardy, has reportedly demanded that Coleen shares screenshots that prove she is guilty of the leaks.

Coleen meanwhile is said to have had enough of Rebekah "badgering her for the evidence," that she had "spent months compiling," and "knows she isn't wrong."

(Image: WireImage)

It was thought that Coleen was "happy to co-operate," but the reaction of Rebekah has meant that she has closed up shop and will only deal with her through legal teams.

Coleen is apparently "happy to never speak to her in person again," while Rebekah has hit out at for being shamed in public over the leaks.
